Name: Secreted Proteins Via GO Annotation And WoLF PSORT For shCTSB Paper
Tools:
GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
get_subontology_from, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside in lysosomes.
Filter1, Extracts uniprot accessions from all proteins in the input list that are predicted by WolfPsort to be lysosomal and/or extracellular.
Convert characters1, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside extracellularly.
Filter1, tp_easyjoin_tool, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
get_subontology_from, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
get_subontology_from, tp_cut_tool, wolf_psort, Removes comment lines at the head of the Uniprot Go database file.
Grep1, tp_sorted_uniq, filters out all proteins in the input protein list of interest that are annotated as "extracellular region" and "lysosome" and "plasma membrane" excluding "extracellular organelle" and "cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane"
comp1, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
get_subontology_from, bg_uniq, uniprot, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
